mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, MOTTO, HEAD_URL, PHONE
mapper.insert: insert into STUDENT (ID, NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, MOTTO, HEAD_URL, PHONE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{motto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update STUDENT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOTTO = #{motto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_URL = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
